name: Rafael Albuquerque
description:
Hello world.

I'm a web developer, full-time dreamer, music addict, soon-to-be king of the world and other things I can't really remember at the moment.

You might want to check my projects page or maybe my GitHub repositories.

You may find me on every social network under the name of rafaqueque. I'm pretty sure you'll be amazed by the things I publish on my personal blog as well.

Or not. Feel free to contact me at c.rafael.s.albuquerque@gmail.com.
